word:
Manuscript 94, 1894, entire manuscript. ("Experience With Fannie Bolton," cir. 1894.)-- [First part missing] Before a large family at the table questions were asked in reference to my work. She stated that was preparing all the manuscripts for Mrs. White and it went under her name but it was her production. Mrs. White was a very ignorant woman. She could not write and could not put two sentences together; but she made 
                                                                           124

 the articles and Mrs. White had the credit for doing them.
